title: Comment from Dr. Mha Atma S Khalsa

analysis.key_quote: The Proposed Rule would politicize the system and take us back to the 19th Century era when the civil service was filled with the corruption of only choosing people loyal to the current Administration.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a nonpartisan civil service and expressing concerns about the potential for politicization and corruption, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
